description: Transplant surgery for pulmonary hypertension (PH) can involve replacing the heart and lungs, or just the lungs. It is more common in children than in adults, but is rarely used these days.

As part of your recovery, you may start by getting care at a hospital. You may then move to outpatient treatment. Depending on the nature or extent of your injury, your treatment might be given by physical therapists.

Lab Tests Online is an award-winning health information web resource designed to help patients and caregivers understand the many lab tests that are a vital part of medical care. Since its launch in 2001, Lab Tests Online has helped millions of users learn about their tests and discuss them more clearly with their healthcare providers.
